content: Add MutationStatus enum to response_types.rs
Add mutation_status and error_reason fields to MutationPathInternal
Add mutation_status and error_reason fields to MutationPath
Remove NotMutatable and PartiallyMutatable variants from MutationPathKind
Update MutationPathKind description() and Display implementations
Run build check and fix errors after MutationStatus changes
Add RecursionDepth parameter to MutationPathBuilder trait
Add RecursionDepth struct with increment() and exceeds_limit() methods
Update TypeKind::build_paths() to accept and manage RecursionDepth
Run build check and fix errors after RecursionDepth changes
Add build_not_mutatable_path helper method to MutationPathBuilder implementations
Implement From<&MutationSupport> for Option<String> conversion
Update ArrayMutationBuilder to extract element type and recurse
Update ListMutationBuilder to extract element type and recurse
Update MapMutationBuilder to handle value type recursion
Run build check and fix errors after container builder updates
Update StructMutationBuilder with single-pass recursion logic
Update TupleMutationBuilder with single-pass recursion logic
Update EnumMutationBuilder to return atomic mutation paths
Run build check and fix errors after endpoint builder updates
Run cargo clippy and check for warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Delete validate_mutation_capability() method entirely
Delete type_supports_mutation_detailed() method entirely
Delete type_supports_mutation_with_depth_detailed() method entirely
Run build check and fix errors after precheck deletion
Update all build_paths callers to pass RecursionDepth::new()
Update conversion functions for MutationPath from MutationPathInternal
Run final build check and fix any remaining errors
Run cargo nextest run
Review test results and stop if failures
